item.title: Reading notes: Ethics for Engineering
Making Obsidian Talk with Google's Fancy Wavenet Voices
item.description: Making Obsidian Talk with Google’s Fancy Wavenet Voices: A Quick Hack I’m sharing a little hack I put together. As a hardcore Obsidian user, I was getting frustrated with the available text-to-speech options. I really wanted to use Google’s Wavenet voices because they sound amazing, but couldn’t find a plugin that did exactly what I wanted. So I sorted it out myself. I cobbled together a hack using Google Cloud’s Text-to-Speech API and Obsidian’s Shell Commands plugin.
